snippet: The Court of Arbitration for Sport rejected an appeal by Russia, confirming that none of the country’s athletes would participate in the Games that begin on Sept. 7....
abstract: Court of Arbitration for Sport upholds decision to ban Russia from Paralympic Games due to widespread, state-sponsored doping.
lead_paragraph: The Court of Arbitration for Sport rejected an appeal by Russia, confirming that none of the country’s athletes would participate in the Games that begin on Sept. 7.

headline.main: Court Upholds Doping-Related Ban on Russia at Paralympics
headline.print_headline: Sports Court Upholds Doping-Related Ban on Russian Athletes at Paralympics
